name: Hotel Il Viandante

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A lovely hotel although a little hard to find first time when arriving by car! Had a beautiful room on first floor to the right of the entrance which looked out onto the garden and small lane at the side.
reviews.title: Loved our stay here

reviews.text: Very comfortable with everything you need. Friendly owners/staff and very helpful with suggestions for places to eat etc. Excellent breakfast. We thoroughly enjoyed our 2 nights here and would certainly return. The flying displays by the house martins are spectacular too!
reviews.title: Cute and functional

reviews.text: This B&B had a lovely garden and was in a great location. The breakfast was lovely, homemade cakes and jams were yummy, although very sweet for us at breakfast! The owners were very friendly and helpful with restaurant reservations and directions to the beach. The room was fine, big enough and the bathroom was nicely decorated, we were only given one towel though so one of us had to have a soggy towel to dry ourselves on both the nights we stayed :( the owners were so nice we didnt like to complain, we just hoped they would give us two towels the next day, bute alas they didnt. Small niggle, but still attention to detail is important in a small business. If I was every to go back to San Teodoro I would stay here again. Although the beaches werwe beautiful around the area, you need a car to get to them, plus we were not bowled over by the modern feel of the town, I love old towns so was a bit disappointed by the feel of San Teodoro, if you are looking for lovely beaches though this is a great place to come!
reviews.title: Nice little hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very friendly owners. Nice rooms (although not with old world charm). Great breakfast with home made jams made by the owner's mother (try the fig jam!). Within the city center area with quite a few restaurants and shops. In close proximity to very nice beaches (La Cinta). Not easy to find without a good city map...
reviews.title: very beautiful room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we stayed only for a night but if we knew it was so good we would have stayed more.
reviews.title: A simple hotel.

aka: Hotel Il Viandante San Teodoro, Sardinia
description: Il Viandante is an enchanting and charming Hotel situated in San Teodoro center, a laughing town on the North-east coast of Sardinia, 23 km South from Olbia. Our Hotel is directly connected in the historical centre of the town and for this reason ideally reachable for our guests.
